Title: Probabilistic
Definition: Simulation of a large number of synthetic events to estimate their likelihood and severity and estimate overall risk.

Title: Deterministic
Definition: Deterministic approaches analyse disaster scenarios (e.g., historical or worst-case events) to estimate their impact, but do not consider the full range of possible outcomes and do not quantify the likelihood of each impact.

Title: Empirical
Definition: Analysis or data relying on observations, such as hazard intensity recorded during a post-event surveys.
